content.rendered:
A 105 minutes audio set with 22 tracks in .mp3 format.
Tracks 01 to 14: about the Phosphenic Mixing.
Tracks 15 to 22: about the basic head sways.

excerpt.rendered:
Promotional price until January 10, 2023

INCREASE YOUR MENTAL ENERGY TENFOLD (50,6 Mo)

This introductory course of Phosphenism will allow you to realize practical exercises, at home, at your own rhythm. It is a real ‟teacher” which will progressively guide you in the discovery of the marvelous world of phosphenes.

Thus it will reveal to you some practical aspects of the Phosphenological Science, also called Phosphenology, by teaching you how to transform Light Energy into Mental Energy.
